captions.text:
The Tiempo 5 is actually a big launch for
us. What's new and improved, the big thing

is the consistent fit and touch through time.
Delivering a very nice, comfortable leather

boot that provides the player with a great
touch,and comfort through the entire duration of the game.

We developed a new upper package
that reduces water intake.

It absorbs 73 percent less water than the Tiempo 4 and it drys 24
percent faster and the package is actually 88

percent stronger. So you don't have over stretch
and you don't have to heat the boots to dry them

so from day 1 it's the same as at day
100.
For touch we're using a very soft and

supple leather together with the mesh this
two layer upper package actually reduces the

distance between the foot and the ball. We
also added in the Nike All Conditions Control

technology and it provides the player with
an optimal touch in both wet and dry weather.

So for traction we've engineered a plate that
flexes where your foot flexes and provides

stability on the mid-foot where the foot needs
more support. The color progressively fades
just to capture this progressive flex.
From top players to youth players around the world.

They perceive the benefit and they love the
fact that for a leather boot it's keeping

it's shap for a longer period of time so
this allows them to play their natural game
